Package com.ansi.scilla.web.payroll.common

Class TimesheetValidator

java.lang.Object
com.ansi.scilla.web.payroll.common.TimesheetValidator
public class TimesheetValidator
extends java.lang.Object
Validates payroll timesheet record for: * Unknown employee name alias * Expenses <= 20% of gross pay (for this period) * Excessive expense reimbursement per ANSI Policy * Non-Washer * Minimum pay exception * Expenses <= 20% of gross pay (YTD)
Author:
dclewis
